schemaVersion() - Method in interface es.ulpgc.eii.spool.Event
Returns the schema version of the event payload.
SchemaVersion - Record Class in es.ulpgc.eii.spool
A validated value object representing the semantic version of an event's payload schema.
SchemaVersion(String) - Constructor for record class es.ulpgc.eii.spool.SchemaVersion
Compact canonical constructor that validates the semver format.
start() - Method in interface es.ulpgc.eii.spool.crawler.strategy.StreamCrawlerStrategy
Starts the underlying StreamSource and begins receiving events.
start(Consumer<R>, Consumer<Exception>) - Method in interface es.ulpgc.eii.spool.crawler.StreamSource
Starts the source and begins delivering incoming payloads to the provided callbacks.
stop() - Method in interface es.ulpgc.eii.spool.crawler.strategy.StreamCrawlerStrategy
Stops the underlying StreamSource and releases its resources.
stop() - Method in interface es.ulpgc.eii.spool.crawler.StreamSource
Signals the source to stop delivering messages and release any underlying resources (connections, threads, file handles, etc.).
StreamCrawlerStrategy<T> - Interface in es.ulpgc.eii.spool.crawler.strategy
A CrawlerStrategy for continuous, push-based event ingestion from long-lived streaming sources such as Kafka, RabbitMQ, or WebSockets.
StreamCrawlerStrategy.SourceStep<R> - Class in es.ulpgc.eii.spool.crawler.strategy
Intermediate builder step that holds the configured StreamSource and awaits the EventDeserializer to proceed.
StreamCrawlerStrategy.StreamBuilder<R,T> - Class in es.ulpgc.eii.spool.crawler.strategy
Final builder step that assembles the StreamCrawlerStrategy with optional event and error callbacks.
StreamSource<R> - Interface in es.ulpgc.eii.spool.crawler
Abstraction over any continuous, push-based event source such as Kafka, RabbitMQ, WebSockets, or Server-Sent Events.
